Articles.Content: Hey,  I think it would be extremely useful for both the players of the game and the development team as well if there were an inbuilt bug report menu as part of the game, possibly accessed by pressing one of the F-Keys, to easily report issues with the game as we go on. This will make it far easier for the average player to report any issues, as most people are unlikely to put in the effort of trying to report the bug themselves.
